prompts: Create a graceful fire-type Pokemon with flowing mane and fierce eyes.
Imagine a majestic horse-like creature with flames dancing around it.
Show me a wild Pokemon that embodies both speed and fiery energy.
Generate a mythical creature that gallops through grasslands with fiery power.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek white coat and blazing orange mane.
Give me a powerful fire-type that roams the mountains at dusk.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines elegance with fierce fire abilities.
